data.name: My Boss is a Futanari
data.detailed_description:
A new job with decent pay definitely comes with its own set of challenges and obstacles.

In particular, your new Boss is constantly on your ass, making your life as difficult as she can possibly seem to manage.
What would've been a relaxing Friday night, turns into overtime that involves unconventional compensation.

Can you manage to get the work done without stepping on her toes?

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

Kinetic Visual Novel

H-Scenes
Sexy Voice Acting
~5K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

data.short_description: What would've been a relaxing Friday night, turns into overtime that involves unconventional compensation. Can you manage to get the work done without stepping on your new Boss' toes?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
